name: DBO Forum Compacted
description: A style to reduce the content size just a bit across the new destiny.bungie.org forum software.
additional_info: Version 1.0 Features - Removed wider Verdana font from template, back to Arial/Sans-serif - Reduced the line height, white space between text lines - Removed the spacing between top level threads - Bumped comment content into a white region to pop it out from the background - Allowing the browser again to highlight visited links in the same manner as server-supplied (cross-machine) visited posts* - Converted currently highlighted comment in the thread from bold red to grey-highlighted box (similar to HBO) Possible concerns: - Untested in Chrome - Optimized for single post view threaded list * When a forum post is read, the server remembers for a small amount of time, so if you visit the forum on another browser or computer, you'll still know which comments you've read (within that short period of time). Now, visited links will also be highlighted by the local browser for as long as your browser caches your browsing history - but this highlighting doesn't translate across browsers or computers.
